Standard Queen

Benefit from the same amenities as our Standard King Rooms, but with the luxury of that extra bit of sleeping space. Standard Queen Rooms come with a picnic table, a revitalizing rain shower, in-room coffee and tea provisions and two queen beds. Stream your own content directly from your device to the TV with free Wi-Fi.

Book Now
Premium Queen

Enjoy the extra space of our Premium Queen Rooms as you relax after a warm rain shower. Our fast and free Wi-Fi lets you stream your own content from your device onto the smart TV so you can watch your favorite show. These rooms also include a picnic table and all other standard amenities.

Book Now
Standard King

Relax in your King Room after a trip around the quirky sights of Portland. Switch on the smart TV and stream your own content directly via the free Wi-Fi for some quality downtime, your way.

Book Now
Premium King

Enjoy the extra space of our Premium King Rooms and relax on the bed after a warm rain shower. Our fast and free Wi-Fi lets you stream your own content from your device onto the smart TV so you can watch your favorite show. These rooms also feature all standard amenities, including a picnic table

Food/Bar

OUIBar + KTCHN offers bold street fare from far corners of the world while keeping things local with Oregon-brewed beers and wines. In the mood for food and not chitchat? Order via our Radisson RED app and take your meal back to your suite.

See Menu
